item.title: Love Shagun
item.description: Love Shagun is a romantic comedy about seven different definitions of love where the definitions are the characters themselves. This film encompasses the menial insecurities of today's youth and different emotional scenarios. 'Respect' is one of the key aspects and Love Shagun reinforces the importance of respect for each other in a relation. But at the same time, Love Shagun gives a crucial message of giving 'space' to one another.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Love Shagun, Anuj Sachdeva, Nidhi Subbaiah, Shemaroo Full Movies, Comedy

item.title: Best Aactors
item.description: The film deals with the story of four close friends Nandu, Madhu, Abhi and Krishna who decide to go on a holiday trip to Goa. After reaching there, both Nandu and Madhu spot two enticing beauties Jaya Sudha (Madhurima) and Jaya Pradha (Kesha Kambhati) and start wooing them. Twist in the tale arises when these girls reveal that one of them is suffering with a lethal sexual disease which has been deliberately transmitted to one of the two friends. Who are these girls ? What is their actual motive ? and Who among Nandu and Madhu will succumb to death because of this deadly disease forms the rest of the story.
item.actor: Ananda Krishna Nandu, Madhu Nandan, Thagubothu Ramesh, Saptagiri
item.tags: Telugu Movies, Full Movies, Films, Entertainment, VIU, Comedy, Romance, Drama, Best Actors, Whacked out media

item.title: Pandavullo Okkadu
item.description: Five friends take inspiration from an elderly figure to never part ways. They take an oath under the condition that they will not get married at all - for the fear that a girl might break their friendship. They grow up and continue to follow the same principle, except Vaibhav, who doesn't want to give into this humbug, yet does so for the sake of friendship. At a point, he escapes to the city, on a mission to find a girl for himself. VTV Ganesh plays the character of a half gentleman, who helps a desperate lover boy. But he fails to calculate what might happen when these buddies discover his affair. What really happens, is the story of Pandavulu Okkadu.
item.actor: Vaibhav Reddy, Karunakaran, VTV Ganesh, Arjunan
item.tags: Telugu Movies, Full Movies, Films, Entertainment, VIU, Comedy, Drama, Pandavullo Okkadu, Whacked out media

item.title: Dheerudu
item.description: The story opens in Karaikudi, where Gouravam (Santhanam) is a well-known traditional cook making a living undertaking orders for marriage functions. He is forced into taking an order for a local goon’s wedding and is not happy about it. Saravanan (Vishal) and his four friends, who come to work for him as junior cooks, offer to help him but land him in even greater trouble and they are forced to flee from Karaikudi. The story shifts to Trichy, where Saravanan and his friends have grand plans of opening a restaurant with the help of Gouravam and his money. Here, just like in Malaikottai, it is love at first sight for Saravanan when he sees Aishwarya (Aishwarya Arjun). Things go wrong and as their love deepens we are introduced to two rival gangs, Kasi and Manaa along with a ‘Madurai Anachi’ who are constantly at each other’s throat. In a conflict Manaa forces Aishwarya to marry him and in the process of saving his love Saravanan reveals his past. Saravanan is a jail return who had killed 3 people in Madurai including Anachi's only son to avenge the murder of an orphan kid whom Saravanan considers as his little sister. The rest of the story is how Saravanan protects his love and kill the dark forces.
